title: When a post is reported, what happens to the report?
body: Does each report get sent to a random mod? Or to all mods? Or to a mod who knows the rules of the particular sub-board in question? Does a report disappear once handled?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=lYa5oK30,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-09-28T20:48:36.893+0000)
>
> Does each report get sent to a random mod? Or to all mods? 

It goes into a queue.

>Or to a mod who knows the rules of the particular sub-board in question? 

Moderators only address those reports they feel comfortable handling. Often, complex cases are discussed with the team.

>Does a report disappear once handled?

No. Even dismissed reports can be retrieved.
